entry.def: Discriminatory laws or practices are unfair because they treat one group of people worse than other groups.

example.ex: These reforms will abolish racially discriminatory laws.
example.tran: 这些改革措施将彻底废除带有种族歧视的法律。

means.word_mean: 1. being biased or having a belief or attitude formed beforehand;
2. containing or implying a slight or showing prejudice;

sentences.sentence: "a preferential shop gives priority or advantage to union members in hiring or promoting"
